ygData.subject: RE: Digest Number 531
ygData.msgSnippet: FYI, serpentine are 3dex/9agi, no str.  sorry i correct everyone, forgive me =) Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard Tyria Sarkin, L31 High Elf Wizard Manda
ygData.messageBody:
FYI, serpentine are 3dex/9agi, no str. sorry i correct everyone, forgive me
=)

Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Tyria Sarkin, L31 High Elf Wizard
Manda D'ulin, L22 Wood Elf Warrior
Mithaniel Marr Server

> As far as
> bracers - I've been blessed with a pair of serpentine
> bracers - (str +3, agi +9) they seem to help a lot. I
> zoned into Droon the other night, and dodged 4 arracks
> in a row, before zoning.
> Aside from those differences, that's exactly what I
> wear. I'll post my stats at a later date.
>
>
>
> Double Entendre
> Bard of 21 Songs
> Exposing himself for a bind, somewhere on Innoruuk
